T02D1551:199a-0: @199a # // rgya gar skad du shr'i tattva dzny'a na siddhi /
T02D1551:199a-2: dpal de kho na nyid ye shes grub pa /
T02D1551:199a-3: dpal rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1551:199a-4: rlung gis bskyod pas 'og gi 'khor lo nas bzhengs glog gi zer ltar 'od gsal zhing //
T02D1551:199a-5: rtsibs gnas gsum du bsregs nas 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod gyur bdud rtsi rgyun rab 'bab //
T02D1551:199a-6: sangs rgyas ye shes bcud dang 'dres shing skyon bral shin tu dga' ba'i tshogs ster ba //
T02D1551:199a-7: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spyod dang bral ba'i phag mo yis ni khyad la srungs //
T02D1551:199a-8: ka sogs yi ger bskor nas sprul ba'i rtsibs can nyid dbang dkyil 'khor las bzhugs shing //
T02D1551:199a-9: 'bar ba'i me ltar rab 'bar bdud rtsi rab 'dzag padma'i skad pa ltar phra ba //
T02D1551:199a-10: rig ma sangs rgyas tshogs rnams bsreg cing 'khor lo gsum po 'byed pa gang yin pa //
T02D1551:199a-11: kun dga' dang bcas rol pas gyen gshegs phag mo
T02D1551:199a-12: khyed ni sems la gsal gyur cig / rdo rje
T02D1551:199b-1: rdo rje sngon song phag mo la //
T02D1551:199b-2: mgos phyag 'tshal nas rang dran phyir //
T02D1551:199b-3: bdag gis de nyid shes grub brjod //
T02D1551:199b-4: yid dang mthun pa'i dben gsan su //
T02D1551:199b-5: mgon pos mgo mtshan blo ldan zhugs nas ni //
T02D1551:199b-6: der ni shin tu 'jam pa'i stan dag la //
T02D1551:199b-7: kun nas dag par rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02D1551:199b-8: de rjes yi ge gsum gyis sngags grub pa //
T02D1551:199b-9: rgyal ba rdor 'dzin snying po ming med kyis //
T02D1551:199b-10: bris nas me tog dmar pos mchod par bya //
T02D1551:199b-11: rdo rje dang po mchog gi snod du ni //
T02D1551:199b-12: g-yas pa las gzhan lag pa bcug nas kyang //
T02D1551:199b-13: nye bar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du //
T02D1551:199b-14: lag pa reg nas rdo rje'i khrus bya'o //
T02D1551:199b-15: mthe bong chen po dang ni sor mo rnams //
T02D1551:199b-16: yang dag ldan pas lag pas bkod byas nas //
T02D1551:199b-17: dpa' bo yi ni dbang phyug drug po yi //
T02D1551:199b-18: sngags rnams kyis ni lus la dgod par bya //
T02D1551:199b-19: de rjes la yang rdo rje 'chang steng du //
T02D1551:199b-20: tshon bzang sbyar ba las skyes snod snyoms la //
T02D1551:199b-21: zha nye las skyes phye ma so ma dag / seng ras dag tu dal bus btsags la 'gram //
T02D1551:199b-22: der ni gser las byas pa'i thur ma yis //
T02D1551:199b-23: rgyal ba'i snying po'i snying po 'khor lo ni //
T02D1551:199b-24: gtsug phud can gyis zur ldan mngon bris nas //
T02D1551:199b-25: de yi snying por sngags kyi phreng ba bri //
T02D1551:199b-26: 'khor lo'i phyi rol shar gyi cha dang ni //
T02D1551:199b-27: byang dang nub dang gzi ldan sras phyogs su //
T02D1551:199b-28: bkra shis dam pa rnams ni rim pa bzhin //
T02D1551:199b-29: lag pa g-yon pa yis ni mngon par bri //
T02D1551:199b-32: rdo rje lha mo bkug nas gsang sngags kyi //
T02D1551:199b-33: yi ge la ni bcug nas bsdams pa dang //
T02D1551:199b-34: cho ga yis ni yongs su mnyes par bya //
T02D1551:199b-35: de rjes sngags kyi rang bzhin de la ni //
T02D1551:199b-36: bza' dang bca' dang ldag dang btung ba dang //
T02D1551:199b-37: gzhi ba bya 'dod yon lnga dang bcas rnams kyi //
T02D1551:199b-38: mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa dag bya //
T02D1551:199b-39: sna tshogs stobs ni myos byed dang bcas pa //
T02D1551:199b-40: shin tu khyad 'phags mchod pa rnam lnga dang //
T02D1551:199b-41: glu dang rol mo dang ni gar rnams dang /
T02D1551:199b-42: bskor ba phyag 'tshal bstod pa rnams kyis ni //
T02D1551:199b-43: nyin re bzhin nam zla phyed so so'am //
T02D1551:199b-44: zla re bzhin nam tshes ni bcu pa las //
T02D1551:199b-45: dngos grub 'dod pa'i dam pas ji skad du //
T02D1551:199b-46: bshad bzhin mchod pa'i cho ga 'di la bya //
T02D1551:199b-47: de kho na nyid ye shes grub pa las //
T02D1551:200a-0: @200a * // phyi rol mchod pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1551:200a-2: // / de nas gtso chen phyi rol mchod pa'i tshul //
T02D1551:200a-3: byas pas sprul ba'i rtsibs can pad dbus su //
T02D1551:200a-4: dbugs bral snying gar tsa zer can gzugs la //
T02D1551:200a-5: sdar brjod pa yi lha mo bsgom bya ste //
T02D1551:200a-6: dgongs ka'i thun mtshams dmar thag mdog can 'od dpung tshogs kyis mdun gyi gzir bcom zhing //
T02D1551:200a-7: dpag med 'od 'phro nyam thag kun gcod pa yi gri gug g-yas kyi phyag na 'dzin //
T02D1551:200a-8: rgyal mtshan dang bcas g-yon pas pad snod shin tu dkar ba khrag gis bkang 'dzin cing //
T02D1551:200a-9: thod phred rdo rje phreng bas dbu bcings mgo skra grol zhing gyen du 'greng gyur pa //
T02D1551:200a-10: mgo bo'i phreng bas sku brgyan khrag gis zhal bkang ro yi spyan ldan grol ba'i gdangs //
T02D1551:200a-11: skal ldan sa glog zhal ni gyen du lta zhing rtsa ba'i zhal ni cung zad khro //
T02D1551:200a-12: kun dga' dang bcas rjes su chags shing sna tshogs nyams can skyil krung phyed pa'i gar //
T02D1551:200a-13: phyag rgya ldas ni rgyas btab na bza' dang bral bcu drug lo tshad sku mchog can //
T02D1551:200a-14: ye shes dgug sogs snga ma bzhin du ni //
T02D1551:200a-15: cho ga'i rim pa sngags pas byas nas ni //
T02D1551:200a-16: bkra shis dpral ba yis ni mngon phyogs la //
T02D1551:200a-17: myur bar 'khor ba gcig ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1551:200a-18: de yi rjes la bya lam khams su ni //
T02D1551:200a-19: gru gsum ri mo yi ni sul nang du //
T02D1551:200a-20: 'khor lo dmar po rab tu 'bar ba ni //
T02D1551:200a-21: myur bar sngar bshad lta bur 'khor bar bsgom //
T02D1551:200a-22: lhag pa'i shugs kyis bstan pa ltar gnas shing //
T02D1551:200a-23: rlung med mi g-yo mar me ltar gsal des //
T02D1551:200a-24: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo bzhu byas nas //
T02D1551:200a-25: bdud rtsi'i thig le zags pas khrus byas shing //
T02D1551:200a-26: sku gsum ngo bo mchog tu lhan cig tu //
T02D1551:200a-27: skyes pa'i bdag nyid 'gro la khyab byed cing //
T02D1551:200a-28: bde ba dpag tu med pa'i rgyur 'phro ba //
T02D1551:200a-29: nub tu bltas nas phyi nas blta bar bya //
T02D1551:200a-30: nyi ma re re bzhin du thun re'am //
T02D1551:200a-31: ji ltar khom bzhin 'di ni ji srid du //
T02D1551:200a-32: dngos grub mtshan ma mthong ba de srid par //
T02D1551:200a-33: bsgom bya de yang gsal bar brjod par bya //
T02D1551:200a-34: 'bad med skyes pa dga' ma'i shugs dang rjes 'brel bas //
T02D1551:200a-35: gang tshe rnam par bsgoms pa 'di ni gsal gyur cing //
T02D1551:200a-36: lcags kyis bzhu ba la sogs gnod pa mi tshor ba //
T02D1551:200a-37: de tshe grub pa nye bar gnas par gyur pa yin //
T02D1551:200b-0: rnga bo che sogs rab tu brdungs pa @200b rnams kyi sgra //
T02D1551:200b-1: gsal por nyan pa'i spyod yul du ni mi 'gyur zhing //
T02D1551:200b-2: gang tshe rmi lam du ni bla med byang chub
T02D1551:200b-3: mchog / thob na ring por mi thogs bsam gtan
T02D1551:200b-4: pas mchog 'grub // grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong nas 'dre gnas dang //
T02D1551:200b-5: ri ljongs ljon pa'i rna ba la sogs su //
T02D1551:200b-6: gnas nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor ni //
T02D1551:200b-7: blo bzang kyis ni rgyun mi chad par bsgom //
T02D1551:200b-8: grub nas nor 'dzin la sogs rim pa yis //
T02D1551:200b-9: gong nas gong du rab tu thom 'gyur zhing //
T02D1551:200b-10: de tshe nam mkha' lta bur snang ba yis //
T02D1551:200b-11: 'od gsal ba yi ye shes tsam du 'gyur //
T02D1551:200b-12: de dag mtshan mar shes bya mtshan ma yang //
T02D1551:200b-13: rnam pa ldar ni de shes pas rig bya //
T02D1551:200b-14: de nyid phyir na de dag rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1551:200b-15: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis rtogs par bya //
T02D1551:200b-16: dang po ri dags sred bzhin snang ba ste //
T02D1551:200b-17: mtshan ma gnyis pa dud pa'i rnam pa can //
T02D1551:200b-18: gsum pa me khyer dang 'dra bzhi pa de //
T02D1551:200b-19: sgron ma 'bar ba lta bur gsal ba yin //
T02D1551:200b-20: mtshan ma lnga pa rnam par mi rtog pa //
T02D1551:200b-21: sprin bral nam mkha' lta bur snag ba yin //
T02D1551:200b-22: de ltar bu yi mtshan ma mthong nas ni //
T02D1551:200b-23: phyag rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ba yin //
T02D1551:200b-24: ldang bar 'dod pa rnal 'byor ma dang mgor gnas pa'i //
T02D1551:200b-25: mgon la 'dud nas yi ge mu: ni rab tu brjod //
T02D1551:200b-26: langs nas de nyid blo yin bya ba bsgrub bya zhing //
T02D1551:200b-27: rnal 'byor rigs pas rtag tu rnal 'byor ldan par gnas //
T02D1551:200b-28: de kho na nyid ye shes grub pa las //
T02D1551:200b-31: // / slob mas mandala byas shing zhabs pad la //
T02D1551:200b-32: 'dod pas gsol pa mang du btab gyur pa'i //
T02D1551:200b-33: sngags pa yis ni tshes bcu pa dag la //
T02D1551:200b-34: de dag rnams ni rjes su gzung bar bya //
T02D1551:200b-35: rnal 'byor byas pa sngags kyi rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1551:200b-36: lha mo 'khor lo'i bdag nyid can mchod cing //
T02D1551:200b-37: bzlas pa byas par gyur pa'i dang po mchog / kun du blangs te de las 'da' bar bya //
T02D1551:200b-38: de nas mandala lnga ni byas gyur cing //
T02D1551:200b-39: yon phul nas ni mdun du 'grang gyur pa'i //
T02D1551:200b-40: me tog phreng 'dzin slob ma'i mgo bo la //
T02D1551:200b-41: mgon po bsgoms la bla mas blta bar bya //
T02D1551:200b-42: de rjes ji skad bshad pa'i lha mo dang //
T02D1551:200b-43: 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i shugs ldan pa //
T02D1551:200b-44: nye bar gnas pa'i lus la bsams nas ni //
T02D1551:200b-45: de la rdo rje 'dzin pa sbyin par bya //
T02D1551:201a-1: ltar babs pa de la ni //
T02D1551:201a-2: spu ldang ba dang rab tu 'dar ba dang //
T02D1551:201a-3: mchu ma byung ba dang ni 'gyel ba dang //
T02D1551:201a-4: ye shes skyes pa'i rang bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02D1551:201a-5: de rjes dang ldan yon tan dang bcas shing //
T02D1551:201a-6: bla mas sangs rgyas gnyis med gus pa la //
T02D1551:201a-7: rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi //
T02D1551:201a-8: ting 'dzin mchod dang sngags rnams brjod par bya //
T02D1551:201a-9: dad pa dang ni rnam par bral ba yi //
T02D1551:201a-10: grus pa rnam par nyams pa'i slob ma la //
T02D1551:201a-11: yid ches 'phral bskyed shin tu rnam dag pa'i //
T02D1551:201a-12: rnal 'byor 'di ni brjod par mi bya'o //
T02D1551:201a-13: gang zhig sngags dang bcas par gyur pa yi //
T02D1551:201a-14: lha mo'i 'khor lo la ni mchod byed pa //
T02D1551:201a-15: de la 'jigs brgyad po rnams dang ni //
T02D1551:201a-16: sdig pa chen po rnams dang skal ngan dang //
T02D1551:201a-17: dbul ba dang ni nad dang rgas pa dang //
T02D1551:201a-18: sdug bsngal yid mi bde ba rnams dang ni //
T02D1551:201a-19: 'khrug dang 'thab rtsod nyes skyon nyon mongs dang //
T02D1551:201a-20: gsung ba sna tshogs rnams kyang 'jig par 'gyur //
T02D1551:201a-21: gang zhig snying gar 'khor lo'i gsang sngags ni //
T02D1551:201a-22: bsgoms nas 'gog pa'i tshig gis zlos byed des //
T02D1551:201a-23: dngos grub brgyad po rnams dang mngon shes lnga //
T02D1551:201a-24: de bzhin yon tan brgyad po thob par 'gyur //
T02D1551:201a-25: nyin re bzhin du thun bzhir 'bad nas su //
T02D1551:201a-26: sa rlog zhal ni bsgom pa gang yin la //
T02D1551:201a-27: seng ge 'phrog byed dbyig gi snying po yis //
T02D1551:201a-28: thub par dga' ba'i dran pa skye bar 'gyur //
T02D1551:201a-29: lhor lo dang bcas phag zhal can 'di gang zhig sgom byed pa //
T02D1551:201a-30: de la bud med rnams dang rigs pa sna tshogs gos dang ni //
T02D1551:201a-31: bza' btung sna tshogs nor 'bu sa gzhi dang ni khang bzangs dang //
T02D1551:201a-32: lha rdzas kyi ni mal stan dag dang sgrub byed rnams kyang 'byung //
T02D1551:201a-33: de kho na nyid ye shes grub pa las phan
T02D1551:201a-34: yon dang slob ma rjes su gzung ba'i cho ga'o
T02D1551:201a-36: / // / de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i //
T02D1551:201a-37: sngags btu mchog gyur rim pa bzhin //
T02D1551:201a-38: rna nas rna dang de bzhin du //
T02D1551:201a-40: sngar brjod lta bu'i 'khor lo lha'i //
T02D1551:201a-41: tshogs kyi gnas dang ldan pa bri //
T02D1551:201a-42: aa phreng ka phreng de bzhin der //
T02D1551:201a-43: gcig ma tshang ba rim gyis bri //
T02D1551:201a-44: dzha 'og dang steng gnas sbyar ba //
T02D1551:201a-45: ha 'og bsten pas rnam brgyan pa'i //
T02D1551:201a-46: yig mchog de nyid gsal byed ni //
T02D1551:201b-0: dang po nyid du gsum @201b bri bya ;
T02D1551:201b-1: / bha steng rten dang tsha steng gnas pa ni //
T02D1551:201b-2: ta steng gnas dang 'brel pa de rjes bri //
T02D1551:201b-3: sha 'og rten pa da 'og mar bcas dang //
T02D1551:201b-4: sha steng rten pa sha steng gnas dang bcas //
T02D1551:201b-5: li 'og gnas pa nya 'og dang ldan pa //
T02D1551:201b-6: pa steng ta 'og ldan pa de rjes bri //
T02D1551:201b-7: pa steng son pa tha 'og dang ldan pa //
T02D1551:201b-8: ha ta'i bar gnas aee g-yon dang bcas te //
T02D1551:201b-9: tsa sa'i dbus gnas pa dang bha 'og dang //
T02D1551:201b-10: gnas pa tha g-yas dang 'brel de rjes la //
T02D1551:201b-11: ha tha'i dbus son pa dang ta g-yon rten //
T02D1551:201b-12: tha la'i dbus dang 'brel pa phyi nas bri //
T02D1551:201b-13: cha kun gyi ni mtha' dang pha yi bar //
T02D1551:201b-14: de gsum pa yi dang po'i g-yon nas 'brel //
T02D1551:201b-15: la yi 'og na na steng pa dang ldan //
T02D1551:201b-16: tsha steng gnas dang dha 'og tha g-yas ldan //
T02D1551:201b-17: sha 'og gnas pa ta steng ba dang ldan //
T02D1551:201b-18: na 'og tha steng dang ldan phyi nas yin //
T02D1551:201b-19: pha 'og rten dang pha steng tha 'og mar //
T02D1551:201b-20: ldan dang la 'og na steng da ldan no //
T02D1551:201b-21: wa 'og gnas pa r'i 'og stong pa can //
T02D1551:201b-22: gsum dang tsa steng ra 'og gnas bcas gsum //
T02D1551:201b-23: sha 'og gnas pa tha 'og dang ldan zhing //
T02D1551:201b-24: nya yi 'og ma dang yang ldan pa yin //
T02D1551:201b-25: sa yi bar gnas dzha yi g-yon bcas te //
T02D1551:201b-26: gsang chen yi ge'i rnam pa brjod gyur pa //
T02D1551:201b-27: rdo rje lha mo rnams kyi sngags 'di ni //
T02D1551:201b-28: bri zhing bsgom pa brjod par bya ba yin //
T02D1551:201b-29: yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing dang bum pa mchog //
T02D1551:201b-30: dbal ldan 'od dang pa'i 'o ma'i ba yang rab tu bsngags //
T02D1551:201b-31: de dag bsgrub byas 'dir ni nor ster tsam 'gyur te //
T02D1551:201b-32: 'dis ni bde dang bcas pa'i nor rnams ster bar byed //
T02D1551:201b-33: de kho na nyid ye shes grub pa las sngags btu ba'i tsho ga'o /
T02D1551:201b-35: // / mchod pa'i gyur ni cho ga mkhas pa yis //
T02D1551:201b-36: snod la brten pa gang la 'di bris pa //
T02D1551:201b-37: des ni mgo dang mgul pa dpung ba la //
T02D1551:201b-38: brtags pas byin pa'i tshul bzhin bsrung bar bya //
T02D1551:201b-39: bsrung bcas byis pa mthong nas lto 'phye 'byung po dang //
T02D1551:201b-40: gdon dang mtshan mo rgyu dang sha za'i tshogs bcas dang //
T02D1551:201b-41: byis pa 'jigs pas nyam thag byed pa'i rab 'jigs gzhan //
T02D1551:201b-42: stobs ldan seng ges nags su skrag la 'dar bzhin 'byer //
T02D1551:201b-43: rnal 'byor gyi ni man ngag dam pa thob cing yid ches mthong gyur nas //
T02D1551:201b-44: bdag gis gsal ba'i ye shes dri med yang dag grub pa 'di bris te //
T02D1551:202a-0: des na de thob don du grub smra bab tu sbyin pa'i tshul @202a * //
T02D1551:202a-2: lus ngal ba dang rab 'dud rnams kyis bla ma dam pa'i zhabs pad sten //
T02D1551:202a-3: 'jig rten dag nam bzhin phan pa mang po skyes byed de nyid mchog grub gang yin pa //
T02D1551:202a-4: de byas dge ba skyon bral zla ba nya ba'i 'od ltar dkar ba yang dag gang thob pa //
T02D1551:202a-5: des ni 'jig rten rtsod pa'i dri bral rdzogs pa'i
T02D1551:202a-6: byang chub dag pa yi ni snod gyur cig /
T02D1551:202a-7: phyag rgya rgya chen srid dang zhi ba mnyam gyur
T02D1551:202a-8: sems can kun don byed pa thob par shog /
T02D1551:202a-9: de kho na nyid ye shes yang dag par grub
T02D1551:202a-10: pa zhes bya ba bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim
T02D1551:202a-11: pa dpal 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D1551:202a-12: mkhas pa chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i zhal
T02D1551:202a-13: snga nas kyi zhabs kyi rdul la rig pa pandi
T02D1551:202a-14: ta stong nyid ting nge 'dzin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D1551:202a-16: / bal po'i a'a ts'a r+ya bha rendra ru tsi dang /
T02D1551:202a-17: lo ts'a ba blo ldan shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o /
